definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: Bow and sword and battle I will abolish from the land, so that all may lie down in safety.
sentences.chinese: 又必在国中折断弓刀，止息争战，使他们安然躺卧。

sentences.english: Israel lost the first battle to take the city because of Achan's sin.
sentences.chinese: 以色列在第一次的争战中失败，这是因为亚干犯罪。

sentences.english: Then came Amalek， and fought with Israel in Rephidim.
sentences.chinese: 那时，亚玛力人来在利非订，和以色列人争战。

sentences.english: Now for three years there was no war between Aram and Israel.
sentences.chinese: 亚兰国和以色列国三年没有争战。

sentences.english: A Sino-American trade spat is all too plausible.
sentences.chinese: 一场中美贸易争战的爆发也实在是很合乎情理。

sentences.english: Do not be afraid of them; the LORD your God himself will fight for you.
sentences.chinese: 你不要怕他们，因那为你争战的是耶和华你的神。

sentences.english: Then Jephthah gathered all the men of Gilead and fought with Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 于是耶弗他招聚基列人，与以法莲人争战。
周围遭患难，外有争战，内有惧怕。

sentences.english: There was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam throughout Abijah's lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 罗波安在世的日子常与耶罗波安争战。

sentences.english: And they continued three years without war between Syria and Israel.
sentences.chinese: 亚兰国和以色列国三年没有争战。

sentences.english: and to think that my father fought for you, risked his life to rescue you from the hand of Midian
sentences.chinese: 从前我父冒死为你们争战，救了你们脱离米甸人的手。

sentences.english: Did he ever quarrel with Israel or fight with them?
sentences.chinese: 他曾与以色列人争竞，或是与他们争战吗？

sentences.english: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.
sentences.chinese: 亚撒和以色列王巴沙在世的日子常常争战。

sentences.english: Then shall the LORD go forth, and fight against those nations, as when he fought in the day of battle.
sentences.chinese: 那时耶和华必出去与那些国争战，好像从前声战一样。

sentences.english: For my father fought for you, and adventured his life far, and delivered you out of the hand of Midian
sentences.chinese: 从前我父冒死为你们争战，救了你们脱离米甸人的手。

sentences.english: For three years there was no war between Aram and Israel.
sentences.chinese: 亚兰国和以色列国三年没有争战。

definition: to go on or send a punitive expedition
variant of 撒旦[Sa1 dan4], Satan or Shaitan
